SELECT f.id, f.house_id AS houseId, f.create_time AS createTime,
h.name, h.build_area AS buildArea, h.total_price AS totalPrice, h.house_type_id AS houseTypeId, h.floor_id AS floorId, h.direction_id AS directionId, h.default_image_url AS defaultImageUrl,
